keepConnect.name: Estague'
keepConnect.helperText: Yanggen un klika i link giya Start, pues na’i i link. Este na atension ha nesessita na u guaha lina’la’ gi lina’la’ niha.

url.name: faisen hao
url.helperText: I Uttimo-mu, put hemplo://192.168.0.2:7001, pat i gå'ga'://exampla.com/fa'tinas
url.error: I maolek na URL, un URL ni' ha tutuhon gi i at:// pat wwws -
